    • check

      public static int check(Piece[][] board, String you, String enemy, int[] num, boolean noking)
      counts how many pieces can move to a king (if num==null) or a certain coordinate , this tells you how many people are checking piece
      Parameters:
      board -
      you - , name of color you on attack
      enemy - , name of king you want to get
      num - , array of coordinate
      noking - , exclude king from seeing if it can check a spot of king
      Returns:
      int of how many pieces are checking a spot or king

    • checkCoordinates

      public static String checkCoordinates(Piece[][] board, String you, String enemy, int[] num)
      returns all coordinates of pieces checking current piece as a String
      Parameters:
      board -
      you - name of color on attack
      enemy - name of enemy you want to checkmate
      num - int array of coordinates
      Returns:
      String

    • selfCheck

      public static boolean selfCheck(Board board, int[] num, int a, String s)
      check to see if a move will put your own king into attack
      Parameters:
      board -
      num - array of coordinates
      a - , what kind of move is it, regular, castling, en passant, or promotion
      string - to choose what promtion you can
      Returns:
      boolean true if move is valid, false if not

    • selfCheckMate

      public static boolean selfCheckMate(Board board, int[] num)
      Parameters:
      board -
      num - int array of 4[], simulates a move to check if there is checkmate (if a piece moves to go after checking piece, will king be in checkmate)
      Returns:

    • checkMate

      public static boolean checkMate(Board board)
      Checks to see if there is checkmate , if 1 person, check if you can block them, capture them, or run away if 2 see if you can run away
      Parameters:
      board -
      Returns:
      boolean to see if there is checkmate or not

    • oneTurn

      public static boolean oneTurn(String input, Board board)
      simulates one turn of chess, does movement, check for draw, resignation, does checks to see if move valid and sees if checkmate occured
      Parameters:
      input - (what person typed),
      board -
      Returns:
      boolean (false if game ends, true if game continues)
